name: Alakazam
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokemon to another as long as you don't Knock Out that Pokemon. This power can't be used if Alakazam is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Articuno
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. If tails, this attack does 10 damage to each of your own Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Charizard
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may turn all Energy attached to Charizard into Fire Energy for the rest of the turn. This power can't be used if Charizard is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Discard 2 Energy cards attached to Charizard or this attack does nothing.

name: Dark Blastoise
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Dark Blastoise but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 40 damage in this way.
Attack2Text: Dark Blastoise does 10 damage to itself. Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Dark Blastoise during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

name: Dark Dragonite
AbilityText: When you play Dark Dragonite from your hand, search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokemon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Dark Persian
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon and switch it with the Defending Pokemon. This attack can't be used if your opponent has no Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Dark Raichu
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, flip another coin. If the second coins is heads, this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. If the second coin is tails, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Dark Slowbro
AbilityText: When you play Dark Slowbro from your hand, choose up to 3 Basic Pokemon and/or Evolution cards from your discard pile and put them into your hand.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Dark Vaporeon
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Energy cards attached to it, choose 1 of them and discard it.

name: Flareon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 10 damage.
Attack2Text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Flareon or this attack does nothing.

name: Gengar
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your opponent's Pokemon to another (even if it would Knock Out the other Pokemon). This power can't be used if Gengar is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and this attack does 10 damage to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Gyarados
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Hitmonlee
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon, and this attack does 20 damage to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Jolteon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 10 damage.
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Machamp
AbilityText: Whenever your opponent's attack damages Machamp (even if Machamp is Knocked Out), this power does 10 damage to the attacking Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.) This power can't be used if Machamp is already affected by a Special Condition when your opponent attacks.

name: Muk
AbilityText: Ignore all Pokemon Powers other than Toxic Gases. This power stops working while Muk is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Ninetales
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and switch it with the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Ninetales or this attack does nothing.

name: Venusaur
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may take 1 Grass Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokemon and attach it to a different one. This power can't be used if Venusaur is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Zapdos
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Zapdos does 30 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: Discard all Energy cards attached to Zapdos or this attack does nothing.

name: Beedrill
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Butterfree
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon, if any. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Remove a number of damage counters from Butterfree equal of half the damage done to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance) (rounded up to the nearest 10). If Butterfree has fewer damage counters that that, remove all of them.

name: Electrode
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon isn't Colorless, this attack does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon of the same type as the Defending Pokemon (including your own). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Exeggutor
Attack1Text: Switch Exeggutor with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy attached to Exeggutor. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Golem
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage to each Pokemon on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Golem does 100 damage to itself.

name: Hypno
Attack1Text: Look at up to 3 cards from the top of either player's deck and rearrange them as you like.
Attack2Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and this attack does 10 damage to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Jynx
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Kabutops
Attack2Text: Remove a number of damage counters from Kabutops equal to half the damage done to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance) (rounded up to the nearest 10). If Kabutops has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.

name: Magneton
Attack1Text: Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for this attack. (Any other effects that would happen after applying Weakness and Resistance still happen.)
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage to each Pokemon on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Magneton does 100 damage to itself.

name: Mewtwo
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a basic Energy card attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon and attach it to another of your opponent's Pokemon of your choice.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for this attack. (Any other effects that would happen after applying Weakness and Resistance still happen.)

name: Moltres
Attack1Text: You may discard any number of Fire Energy cards attached to Moltres when you use this attack. If you do, discard that many cards from the top of your opponent's deck.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Nidoking
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage and Nidoking does 10 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. It now takes 20 Poison damage instead of 10 after each player's turn (even if it was already Poisoned).

name: Nidoqueen
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each Nidoking you have in play.

name: Pidgeot
Attack2Text: Unless this attack Knocks Out the Defending Pokemon, return the Defending Pokemon and all cards attached to it to your opponent's hand.

name: Pidgeotto
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon, if any. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If Pidgeotto was attacked last turn, do the final result of that attack on Pidgeotto to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Rhydon
Attack2Text: Rhydon does 20 damage to itself. Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon, if any. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon. Switch the Pokemon even if Rhydon is Knocked Out.)

name: Arcanine
Attack1Text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Arcanine or this attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Arcanine does 30 damage to itself.

name: Charmeleon
Attack2Text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Charmeleon or this attack does nothing.

name: Dark Dragonair
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for an Evolution card. Show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Dark Dragonair is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 20 damage.

name: Dark Wartortle
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: If an attack does damage to Dark Wartortle during your opponent's next turn (even if Dark Wartortle is Knocked Out), Dark Wartortle does an equal amount of damage to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Dewgong
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Dodrio
AbilityText: As long as Dodrio is Benched, pay Colorless less to retreat your Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Dodrio.

name: Fearow
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Fearow.

name: Golduck
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Energy cards attached to it, choose 1 of them and discard it.

name: Graveler
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, whenever 30 or less damage is done to Graveler (after applying Weakness and Resistance), prevent that damage. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

name: Haunter
AbilityText: Whenever an attack does anything to Haunter, flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of that attack, including damage, done to Haunter. This power stops working while Haunter is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Ivysaur
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Kabuto
AbilityText: Whenever an attack (even your own) does damage to Kabuto (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack does only half the damage to Kabuto (rounded down to the nearest 10). (Any other effects of attacks still happen.) This power stops working while Kabuto is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Kadabra
Attack1Text: Discard 1 Psychic Energy card attached to Kadabra or this attack does nothing. Remove all damage counters from Kadabra.

name: Kakuna
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Kakuna during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Machoke
Attack1Text: Does 50 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Machoke.
Attack2Text: Machoke does 20 damage to itself.

name: Magikarp
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Magikarp.

name: Meowth
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, draw a card.

Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Metapod during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Nidorina
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Nidorino
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Omanyte
AbilityText: Your opponent plays with his or her hand face up. This power stops working while Omanyte is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Omanyte but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

name: Omastar
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Omastar but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Primeape is now Confused (after doing damage).

Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 20 damage.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Rapidash.

name: Raticate
Attack2Text: Does damage to the Defending Pokemon equal to half the Defending Pokemon's remaining HP (rounded up to the nearest 10).

name: Sandslash
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Seadra but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Seadra.

name: Snorlax
AbilityText: Snorlax can't become Asleep, Confused, Paralyzed, Poisoned, or Burned. This power stops working while Snorlax is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 20 damage.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Tauros. Flip a coin. If tails, Tauros is now Confused (after doing damage).

name: Tentacruel
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Bulbasaur
Attack1Text: Unless all damage from this attack is prevented, you may remove 1 damage counter from Bulbasaur.

Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Charmander
Attack2Text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Charmander or this attack does nothing.

name: Doduo
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Drowzee
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep; if tails, your Active Pokemon is now Asleep. The power can't be used if Drowzee is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Eevee
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon can't attack Eevee during your opponent's next turn. (Benching either Pokemon ends this effect.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 10 damage.

name: Exeggcute
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Unless all damage from this attack is prevented, you may remove 1 damage counter from Exeggcute.

name: Gastly
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Put up to 2 Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand. Gastly does 10 damage to itself.

name: Geodude
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Grimer
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: All damage done by attacks to Grimer during your opponent's next turn is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Magnemite
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each Pokemon on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Magnemite does 40 damage to itself.

name: Mankey

Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 20 damage.

name: Nidoran ♀

name: Nidoran ♂

Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, whenever 30 or less damage is done to Onix (after applying Weakness and Resistance), prevent that damage. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

name: Psyduck
Attack1Text: Draw a card.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Psyduck but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

name: Rhyhorn
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon can't attack during your opponent's next turn. (Benching either Pokemon ends this effect.)

name: Spearow

name: Squirtle

name: Tentacool
AbilityText: At any time during your turn (before your attack), you may return Tentacool to your hand. (Discard all cards attached to Tentacool.) This power can't be used the turn you put Tentacool into play or if Tentacool is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Vulpix
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
